subject: Surfing
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Hoffman’s pioneering big-wave riding in Hawaii in the 1950s charted the way for surfing pilgrimages to Oahu’s North Shore from around the world.
snippet: Mr. Hoffman’s pioneering big-wave riding in Hawaii in the 1950s charted the way for surfing pilgrimages to Oahu’s North Shore from around the world.
